title: 797: MEXICAN BILLIONAIRE SAYS ‘BUY BITCOIN’ IN NEW YEAR MESSAGE!! 5 THINGS TO WATCH IN BTC THIS WEEK!!
description:
Mexico’s 3rd richest man sent out a heart-warming New Year message to Bitcoin enthusiasts on Xmas Eve.

Ricardo Salinas recommended moving away from fiat money and buying Bitcoin in a two-minute festive video.

“Steer clear of fiat money. Whether it’s the Dollar, the Euro, or the Yen –it’s all the same. It’s fake money made of paper lies. Central banks are producing more than ever.”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.ne

Mexico’s 3rd richest man sent out a heart-warming New Year message to Bitcoin enthusiasts on Xmas Eve. Ricardo Salinas recommended moving away from fiat money and buying Bitcoin in a two-minute festive video. “Steer clear of fiat money. Whether it’s the Dollar, the Euro, or the Yen –it’s all the same.
